Name: Discount Dan's Savings and Loan LLC.
Details: A wholly-owned subsidiary of MYOFB LLC, Discount Dan's Savings and Loan (DDS&L) is a reliable source of quick cash for those who need it most. More than one mercenary company has turned to DDS&L to survive just a little longer, and reports that DDS&L engages in predatory lending, intimidation, and racketeering are completely unfounded.
